segments.text: May I take yor order now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , what do you have for appetizer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have caviar , foiegras , lox , cold beef , sour cucumber ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , please bring me the cold beef .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , sir . Do you want some soups ?
segments.speaker: S1
